metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16927 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: Xpdf 4.01.01 has an out-of-bounds write in the vertProfile part of the TextPage::findGaps function in TextOutputDev.cc, a different vulnerability than CVE-2019-9877.

notes.Note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> poppler doesn't have TextPage::findGaps, no indication it is vulnerable to this issue ebarretto> xpdf in Debian uses poppler, which is not affected or fixed

criterions.comment: ipe package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
